alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Johnson and west central Jackson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Overland Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Prairie Village, Merriam, Mission, Fairway, Mission Hills, Countryside and Lackmans. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 219 and 225. Interstate 470 near mile marker 0. Interstate 435 near mile marker 0, and between mile markers 66 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
